    public abstract class CombinedTagger
extends BaseTagger
    A tagger that combines multiple taggers together (in the order of their preference).

      • belongsTo

        public float belongsTo​(Area node)
        Description copied from interface: Tagger
        Checks whether the area may be tagged with the tag. This method does not actually assign the tag to the area.
        Parameters:
        node - The examined area node.
        Returns:
        the relevance of the assignment (0.0 = not assigned, 0.1 = hopefully possible, >0.5 quite possible, 1.0 absolutely sure)

      • extract

        public List<TagOccurrence> extract​(String src)
        Description copied from interface: Tagger
        Extracts the parts of a source string that correspond to this tag.
        Parameters:
        src - The source string.
        Returns:
        A list of extracted strings.
